meta.title: Colome - Home of the Cowboys and Cowgirls

p.span: 105 Carr St. PO Box 367 - Colome, SD 57528

tr.td:
Colome Consolidated School District
Home of the Cowboys and Cowgirls

span.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;

td.span: The Grab and Go Lunch Program is for all children ages 0-18. You do not have to have a child enrolled at the school. You can get a lunch at another school if they are running the program. Winner and Gregory are options. In Colome, the program runs Monday through Friday from 11:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. The meals can be picked up in the lunchroom.

br.span: This page also contains links to flexible learning plans.

td.a:
Information about LIVE STREAMING
for COLOME EVENTS

p.a: Click here to purchase a yearbook.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background: white;

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;

p.span: This is the time of year when the yearbook staff sells copies of the current yearbook. Due to the current circumstances, yearbooks are being offered for online sales. The cost of a 2019-20 yearbook is $35. If you would like to purchase one, you can either click on this link or you can send a check for $35 to the school. If you send a check, please mark it for the yearbook. Due to financial restrictions, no extra books will be ordered this next year. Last year, extra yearbooks were ordered. As a result, we have several 2018-19. If you would like one of these books, the cost is $30.

div.p: VISION STATEMENT: We will provide each student with a diverse education while promoting life readiness for individual success.

p.span: Please contact CHS webmaster for comments/questions.
